# Middleman Neat

A gem for simple usage of [Bourbon Neat](https://github.com/thoughtbot/neat) inside your Middleman projects.

## Installation & usage

Add this line to Middleman's Gemfile:

    gem "middleman-neat"

In your config.rb: 

    activate :neat
